resources.string:
"Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.
To unpin, touch and hold Home and the Power button at the same time."

"Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.
To unpin, touch and hold Home and the Power button at the same time."
To unpin this screen, touch and hold Home and the Power button at the same time.
